app.name: Bloopair
app.short_description: Connect other controllers to your Wii U
app.long_description:
Allows connecting controllers from other consoles like native Wii U Pro Controllers on the Wii U. Bloopair temporarily applies patches to the IOS-PAD module responsible for Bluetooth controller connections.
Usage: - Once launched the Wii U menu should open - You can now connect any supported controller
